portfolio.title: Named Entity Recognition using Bi-LSTM-CRF
portfolio.description: Developed and fine-tuned Bi-LSTM and Bi-LSTM-CRF models for Named Entity Recognition (NER) on the CoNLL-2003 dataset. The Bi-LSTM-CRF model achieved an F1 score of ~83.8%, surpassing the benchmark F1 score of 84% from the reference study. This project demonstrated the ability to detect entities like names, locations, and organizations from unstructured text, showcasing the power of combining deep learning with structured tagging

portfolio.title: AI-Powered Trichoscopy and Trichogram Analysis System
portfolio.description: Engineered a machine learning-based system for trichoscopy and trichogram analysis to assist dermatologists in diagnosing scalp conditions such as alopecia. The system, tested on over 400 images, accurately extracted key parameters like hair density and thickness, leading to a 20% improvement in diagnostic accuracy. Dermatologists validated the system, confirming its potential for real-world use in clinics

portfolio.title: Inventory Demand Forecasting System
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented an inventory demand forecasting system that helped a wholesaler optimize stock levels for over 1,000 products. Using historical sales data, the system predicted demand trends, leading to a 15% increase in sales by minimizing stockouts and overstock situations. This project involved building machine learning models, data preprocessing, and integrating them into a production environment using Python Flask.
